AddUserSummary: See all Your users progress and their tasks. Assign tasks to your users.
FeedbackSubTitle: See how companies like yours have smashed their sales success goals
ResultSummary: Clienty is designed for Danish accountants. It's the kind of software that just works - I don't need to try to make it work. It already does. It's just perfect.
WorkForMeSubTitle: Boost sales and drive leads into your pipeline
ArticleTitleOne: How will Clienty CRM solution help me improve sales?
ParagraphOneTitleOne: Clienty's visual sales pipeline makes customer management an easy task and helps you plan for new customers and leads, discover opportunities, measure key activities, optimize sales processes, and focus on core business, precisely by completing your tasks on time and to the right quality.
ParagraphTwoTitleOne: Automated reminders and follow-ups increase your productivity by eliminating repetitive, time-consuming tasks. Real-time reports show management which business areas to prioritize.
ParagraphThreeTitleOne: Our customers average 28% more deals in their first year.
ParagraphOneTitleTwo: Clienty is ranked as the best value, easiest to set up and easiest to use CRM. Compare our different tiers and choose the best one for you.
ArticleTitleThree: Will Clienty work for a big team?
ParagraphOneTitleThree: Yes! Clienty's CRM platform is well-suited for small businesses and enterprise organizations alike.
ParagraphTwoTitleThree: We empower your large sales team to be more effective when it comes to customer interactions with interactive CRM features like a progress tracker, sales automation, procession forecasting, an activity-based planner and top security.
ParagraphThreeTitleThree: Many of our enterprise customers have increased new accounts by double-digits while seeing revenue soar by over 40%.

We: We couldn't Find the page at the moment.
May: May the force be with you!
Weknow: We know that customers care deeply about privacy and data security.That&rsquo's why we put our best efforts in securing your data. We only use your personal data to improve the quality of our services and the experience you have while using our software.
Purpose: 1. Purpose and Scope of Data Collection
ToUseService: To use our services, customers need to register an account and provide the following information: Full name, phone number and some additional information. The procedure helps us to verify your identity and provides us with accurate contact information for future support.
Exceptfor: Except for mandatory fields marked with *, customers are not obligated to input non-mandatory fields. However, these optional information are very useful for us to improve the quality of our services. Thus, you should input all entry fields when you register an account with us.
Derivative: Derivative information: this refers to information summarized and deduced from the original information created by the customer. For examples, customers navigate from one activity to another activity in the product; customers click on which buttons, etc. We collect and use these derivative information to improve our services.
Weonly: We only use your data for the following purposes:
WeMayShare: We may share derivative information to third party, such as Google Analytics, to improve our services. We commit that this derivative information does not contain any specific data regarding customer personal or organization information (name, phone number, etc.), specific transactions or business secrets.
YourInformation: Your information is stored for the whole duration of our operation.
WePutOur: We put our best efforts in securing your information to prevent unintentional leak and theft.
WeDoNot: We do not share or sell your HR or accounting data and personally identifiable information to any third party unless legally required by laws.
